answers.answer: Dear JudeC,Hemorrhages can be associated with diabetes, high blood pressure, glaucoma.  There are a lot of other causes as well which makes it imperative that you see your eyeMD and get the correct diagnosis.Dr. FeldmanSandy T. Feldman, M.D., M.S.ClearView Eye and Laser Medical CenterSan Diego, California

question: what would cause hemmoraging by optic nerve?
title: hemmoraging by optic nerve
